text: Can't get to a #COVID19 #Vaccine location? The @SNHDinfo will come to you. It's now offering homebound services for those who use items like wheelchair, a walker, crutches, or are bedridden. Call 702-455-0696 or email homeboundvaccine@clarkcountynv.gov to schedule. #Vegas https://t.co/W3COgDu6iN
